November 26, 1962
Mr. John J. Carmody, President
Rotary Club of Washington, D. C.
Mayflower H0tel
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear John:
Thanks for your follow-up and attention to the consideration of William
G. Harley as a potential member of the Washington Rotary Club. You
have referred the question to your classification committee. In that
connection, may I suggest that his classification might be the same
as mine has been? namely, “Educational Television." This particular
category is so new that it has not had time to be itemized in the classi¬
fication book. However, educational television is becoming so im¬
portant in the total broadcasting picture that it fully deserves such a
classification. R.I. had no objection when such a classification was
established in my behalf.
Thank you again for your attention in this matter.
Sincerely yours,
RDH/ml
Raymond D. Hurlbert
Past District Governor
